Netizens submitted a post: On the evening of November 30, the Shandong Provincial Department of Education suddenly issued a notice requiring all universities to have a holiday.
As a result, another notice was issued tonight, no more holidays were given, requiring students to stay in school.
Currently, a large amount of content can be seen when searching for Shandong universities taking holidays

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 1, major media outlets began to report that there was no evidence that COVID-19 had sequelae.
In the past three years, COVID-19 sequelae have always been a lingering shadow in the hearts of the Chinese people, and it has also been the focus of the domestic zero-COVID faction's arguments after countries around the world gradually relaxed their restrictions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Good night everyone 💜

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 2, Guangzhou Yuexiu Public Security suddenly posted the three words "Xu Jiayin" on Weibo, which then triggered speculation from the outside world, with rumors that he had jumped off a building.
Later, there was news that at 1:30 pm, Xu Jiayin posted a voice message in the Evergrande work group, confirming that he was fine.
There is no further news at the moment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 2, in Baoding, Hebei, due to insufficient heating, homeowners in a community held white papers with the word "cold" written on them and marched in the street to protest, shouting "Datang (heating company) is not doing anything"

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Summary of news
Currently, there are sporadic violations of the State Council’s twenty articles in schools/streets/communities across the country, and the implementation of a one-size-fits-all lockdown has continued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I understand Mr. Fang's reasonable doubts, and I also apologize to you for some netizens' insults and attacks on you because of me.
I would like to clarify two points:
1. I have never called on netizens to expose information to me, and all submissions are spontaneous
2. Before any accidents happen, my account will always be used by me personally, without any fan group or any organization
I hope this matter will come to an end, and I will not respond again

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Also, thank you all for clarifying and defending me, and thank you to all the contributors who trusted me. Thank you all.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 1, an alley entrance in Huanglianshu Community, Pingdingshan, Henan, which connects multiple communities, was replaced with a wall because the isolation iron sheet was often pried open by residents.
According to the contributor, in order to facilitate management, only two exits were left in the entire community, and the rest were all blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, in a residential area in Shanghai, people went downstairs to demand the lifting of the blockade

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing announced that starting from the first bus on December 5 (Monday), bus and subway operators shall not refuse passengers who do not have a 48-hour negative nucleic acid test certificate when verifying their health information.

content:
Chengdu, Sichuan
Some people who participated in the protest received a call from the police asking if they participated in the protest and whether their health code had turned yellow. According to this friend, the police claimed on the phone that they had compiled a list of the names of people who participated in the march and were now checking the list and calling to verify.
